name: Burley Honey Bee Trailer - Infants to Children
description: Easily converts from a bike trailer to a stroller – and back again.  The Honey Bee has seating for 1 or 2 passengers, adjustable 5-point harnesses, and lots of room for toys and snacks. It also offers a comfortable ride for both driver and passengers. To make a quick switcheroo, the front stroller wheel locks into place for walking and folds out of the way for riding. Reflective piping, UPF rated windows, an adjustable handlebar that does double duty as a roll cage (when being used as a trailer), and a heat-treated aluminum frame, keep your passengers safe on your way from A-to-B.Included quick-change stroller wheel lets you go from biking, to strolling in a matter of seconds.UPF 50+ rated tinted windows block more than 98% of harmful UV.Water resistant cover helps little ones safe from the elements.Flex connector lets you lie the bike down, while the trailer remains upright.Wheels are easily removable with a push button quick-release.Adjustable handlebar doubles as a roll cage when being used in trailer mode, handlebar height: 76.2-116.8 cm.Folding design makes for easy storage and transport, folded dimensions: 90.2 x 74.3 x 31.8cm.Open dimensions: 84.5 x 74.9 x 94 cm.Interior seated height: 66 cm.Interior seat width: 57.2 cm.Interior shoulder width: 55.9 cm.Seated leg room: 53.3 cm.Add to the trailer's versatility with the 16+ wheel kit (available separately), perfect for tackling snow, sand, and gravel.Includes: trailer, user’s manual, tow bar with 1-wheel stroller kit and hitch, 2 wheels, 2 wheel guards, and safety flag.
